fields.headline: Tropical bargains
fields.bodyText: 1 Kenya for £505 Just because it's full-board, doesn't mean you have to eat in every night - use the hotel as a base to explore the area. Thirteen nights at the Shanzu-Paradise Hotel, 18km north of Mombasa, costs from £505. December departures. lastminute.com. 2 Fly club to Goa for £249 You'd be hard pushed to get economy seats for this price. Goaway is offering premium club flights to Goa for £249 (from Manchester or London) departing Dec 1 & 8. Seven nights' B&B at the three-star Silla Goa Resort costs £99. goaway.co.uk, 020-7258 7800. 3 Florida fly-drive from £149 A good deal even with the insurance charge added (budget for about £20 a day), departing Dec 2 & 9. Check out floridaboutiquehotels.co.uk for smart accommodation en route. cheapholidaydeals.co.uk. 4 Brazil for £279 This deal includes seven nights' B&B at the Hotel Pizzato Praia on Ponta Negra, a buzzing beach resort on the north-east coast. iglutropical.com/displayoffer.cfm?offer=59301422, 020-8544 6389. 5 Vietnam from £798 Travelling as part of a small group, on public transport, you'll see the highlights on this 15-day tour. £300 (excl flights), plus a local payment of $100. Try Trailfinders (trailfinders.com) for flights from £498. intrepidtravel.com/0800 917 6456.
